mapper.select:
select log_id, log_level, content, service_module, log_name, status, create_time, update_time, shop_id, (select shop_name from weiit_shop where shop_id=c.shop_id) as shop_name from system_common_logs c where 1=1
and log_name like concat('%',#{log_name},'%')
and log_level=#{log_level}
and date(create_time) >= date(#{startTime})
and date(create_time) <= date(#{endTime})
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into system_common_logs (log_level, content, service_module, log_name, status, create_time, update_time, shop_id)
values (#{log_level}, #{content}, #{service_module}, #{log_name}, 0, now(), now(), #{shop_id})
